attributes.additional_details:
The Rt Hon William Hague MP

Thousands of syrian people dying every day from air strikes how long can we let this continue! The UK must act!!

The Syrian people are humans just like us they deserve a free life the same principals this country was build on

How can we let mothers, fathers, brothers, sisters, and young children die every day imagine if it was someone you knew

I am an 21 year old lad and if I can see that this is badly wrong I am sure you can as well

I ask The Rt Hon William Hague MP to meet me to discuss this and push the UK as well as other counties to do the right thing before its too late if we don't  we will then regret not helping

Thank you
